ModSettings.name: EarthToMud AI Fix
ModSettings.title: [Util] EarthToMud AI Fix
ModSettings.description:
This is a fix to the AI's usage of the "Earth To Mud" spell as follows:
SBAI_EarthToMud: - removes check for ELEMENTAL_ARMOR - removes check for RESIST_ELEMENTS - adds check for EARTH_WALKER
SBH_MassSlow: - adds check for target parameter passed as BattleUnit - adds check for target parameter passed as HexCoordinates - adds check for Vector3i.invalid
General fixes to address compiler performance warning(s): - Warning CA1800 - a variable, is cast multiple times.
see https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2015/code-quality/ca1800-do-not-cast-unnecessarily
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
